selectDates: Please choose the dates you would like to move in
minStay: The minimum stay is 1 month. Please select a date range of at least 30 days. For shorter stays, contact us directly.
acceptTerms: I accept the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
requestSent: Your request has been sent. You will be redirected in a few seconds...
howToBook: How can I book a room?
bookOnline: You can book a room through our online platform. Simply choose the room you are interested in and follow the instructions to complete your booking.
priceIncludes: What does the rent price include?
includedBills: The rent price includes all utility bills, as well as access to all shared facilities of the house.
trickyPeople: There are some people who will try to scam you online. Always confirm who you're communicating with and never give out personal or financial information to strangers.
askAdmin: When in doubt, ask the Administration
contactForHelp: If you're unsure about something or need help, always contact the administration.
reportProblems: If you encounter any issues, whether they are related to the room or the house or your safety, please report them to the administration immediately.
minimumStay: The minimum stay is 1 month. Please select a date range of at least 30 days. If you wish a shorter stay, please contact us directly.
houseRules: Are there rules for living in the share house?
basicRules: Yes, we have some basic rules to ensure a peaceful and friendly environment. For instance, we expect all residents to keep shared areas clean and be respectful to others.
canIRegister: Can I use the share house address for city registration?
registerYes: Yes, you can use the share house address for your city registration. Make sure to check the details with the local administration to ensure compliance with all regulations.
howMuchLuggage: How much luggage can I bring?
luggage2to4: Generally, you can bring 2 to 4 boxes of luggage depending on your bed space size. If you have more luggage, please coordinate with the administration as we might have storage space available.
canIReceiveMail: Can I receive mail and packages at the share house?
mailYes: Yes, you can receive mail and packages at the share house. Make sure your name is clearly marked on all shipments to avoid confusion.
noCurfew: No, there is no set curfew. However, we ask all residents to be respectful to others, especially during nighttime.
canIExtend: Can I extend my stay? How much will it cost?
extendYes: Yes, you can extend your stay at the share house. The cost will depend on the duration of the extension. Please contact the administration for specific details.
whenDoesRentStart: When does the rent start? Can I transfer the rent?
rentStartDay: The rent starts the day you move into the share house. For specific details on rent transfers, please contact the administration.
canSmoke: Is smoking allowed in the shared house?
smokeNo: No, smoking is not allowed in the indoor areas of the shared house. There may be designated smoking areas outdoors.
isHairDryer: Is there a hair dryer available?
hairDryerYes: Yes, we have hair dryers in the shared bathrooms. Please use them respectfully and considerately.
whatPeople: What types of people live in the shared house?
diversePeople: Our shared house is home to a wide variety of individuals, from students to professionals, both local and international. We are proud of the diversity and inclusive community we've created.
ACAvailable: Is there air conditioning and heating? Can a resident adjust the machine's temperature?
ACYes: Yes, air conditioning and heating are available. The temperature is set to maintain a comfort level for all residents, but if you have any concerns about the temperature, please communicate with the administration.
canUseKitchen: Can I use the kitchen? I want to cook for myself and save on food costs.
kitchenYes: Yes, all residents have access to the shared kitchen. We ask that everyone cleans up after cooking to maintain a clean and pleasant environment for all.
tenantCleans: Cleaning staff perform regular cleaning of common areas. However, residents are expected to keep their personal areas clean and tidy up after using shared areas.
carouselSubtitle1: Share moments, make memories in our vibrant Share House!
carouselSubtitle2: Experience the joy of community living in our Share House!
